name: Bestow Unseen Shield
effect: The mage casts a protective ward upon others. As with the Forces 2 Unseen Shield spell.

rotes.roteDescription: This rote is usually cast upon an area, creating a barrier with which attacks and objects must contend. Free Council mages often cast this rote with strange devices, while Mysterium willworkers usually invoke its power through more traditional means (Resolve + Occult + Forces).
